questions.question_text:
Sales reps at Ursa Major Solar often give discounts depending on the configuration of the solar panel system. Customers want to know what the different configuration options are. Sales management wants to ensure the opportunity pipeline is as accurate as possible.

What should sales reps do to ensure their quotes and opportunities reflect their sales?

choices.D: Create a new quote record for each of the different product configurations. Sync the most likely to be purchased back to the opportunity.
choices.A: Create new opportunities for each quote request. Change the forecast category to omitted for all except the most likely to be purchased.
choices.C: Use the products related list to associate the different configurations with the opportunity. Update the Amount field with the most likely purchase price.
choices.B: Update the quote record each time the customer requests a different product configuration, and click the sync button to update the opportunity.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
C is not correct because the amount field is not changeable. So D is correct: You canâ€™t edit the amount without deleting the products from the opportunity. https://help.salesforce.com/s/articleView?id=sf.products_considerations_for_adding_to_opportunities.htm&type=5

C. Use the products related list to associate the different configurations with the opportunity. Update the Amount field with the most likely purchase price.

By using the Products related list on the Opportunity, the administrator can associate different configurations with the Opportunity. Updating the Amount field with the most likely purchase price allows for accurate forecasting of the deal. This approach ensures that the Opportunity remains updated with the most relevant information, while avoiding cluttering the Opportunity list with multiple records for the same deal.

discussion.content: D:Before enabling product schedules, the administrator at Universal Containers should consider that to remove a product schedule completely, it must be removed from all price books that include it. Also, product schedules can impact the performance of the system, particularly when there are large numbers of schedule records. Therefore, it is important to carefully plan the implementation and consider using automation tools like Process Builder and Flow to manage the creation and maintenance of product schedules. Additionally, it is important to note that line item schedules are not available in Process Builder or Workflow, but can be used with Apex triggers.

questions.question_text:
The administrator at Cloud Kicks made new fields and page layout adjustments based on new requirements from the service team. The changes have been built in a sandbox and are ready to be deployed into production.

What should an administrator do before deploying the change set in production?

choices.C: Set up a list view for the list of questions.
choices.B: Use a screen flow to ask the questions.
choices.D: Make the field Read Only on the page layout.
choices.A: Set up a restriction rule on the field.

discussion.content:
The correct options are:

B. Use a screen flow to ask the questions.
D. Make the field Read Only on the page layout.

Explanation:

To ensure that users cannot bypass answering questions and set a value for a custom field, the administrator can use a screen flow to ask the questions and make the field Read Only on the page layout. By using a screen flow, the administrator can guide users through a series of questions and force them to set a value for the Tier field. By making the field Read Only, users cannot bypass the screen flow or edit the field directly on the page layout.

Option A, setting up a restriction rule, and Option C, setting up a list view for the list of questions, are not relevant to this scenario.

comments.content: Restriction rules are not validation rules.
how is D correct? Marking the field read only would still allow the user to bypass the field value. It should be A and B. Setting up a restriction rule would not allow to bypass.

While most of the teams only need a few fields filled out to work the lead, the Jupiter team requires additional information to be filled out, such as which moon the lead is coming from. The administrator needs to automate which team is allocated the lead record based on the planet and ensure that every team has all of the information they need.

Which two features will satisfy these requirements? (Choose two.)
